entry.title: Friday: Drizzle. High 7 except plus 3 in onshore winds.
entry.summary: Drizzle or flurries ending near noon then clearing. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 7 except plus 3 in onshore winds. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 5 May 2023
